effect.text: Trade 1 of the other cards in your hand for up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile.

cost.description: Discard 1 other card from your hand

requirements.description: Must have at least 1 other card in hand to discard
Must have at least 1 basic Energy in discard pile

tips: Use in mid-to-late game when you have Energy in discard
Discard duplicate Pokemon or Trainer cards you don't need immediately
Pair with Super Energy Removal to create a renewable disruption engine
Energy Retrieval is card-positive (1 card for 2 Energy)
Use after Professor Oak to recover Energy you discarded

rulings.ruling: You must discard exactly 1 other card from your hand to use Energy Retrieval
You cannot use Energy Retrieval if you have no other cards in hand
You can recover up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile
You can choose to recover only 1 Energy if you want, or 0 if you must
Only basic Energy cards can be recovered (Fire, Water, Grass, Lightning, Psychic, Fighting, Colorless)
Special Energy cards like Double Colorless Energy cannot be recovered with Energy Retrieval
The recovered Energy cards go to your hand, not directly into play
You must show the Energy cards you recover to your opponent
If you have fewer than 2 basic Energy in discard, you recover as many as possible
You can discard an Energy card as the cost and then recover 2 different Energy cards
